class_notes: Prerequisite of EPI 530 or EPI 504. Priority Registration for EPI/GLEPI students and those pursuing GME Certificate until Nov 10th.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530.  Introduces the basic concepts and premises of the systematic reviews and meta-analysis of epidemiologic studies.
sections: Class Nbr: 2832, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 1-2:50p, Instructor: M. Goodman, Status: Open
